platform.name: windows
platform.info: ********************************************************** * Manual steps required to add this plugin on Windows 8.1 only. (Windows Phone 8.1 is not supported) * * This plugin requires a Native windows reference that cannot be added automatically. * * To add a reference to the native Windows Runtime component (SAP.EncryptedStorage.winmd), please do the following * 1) Open the Cordova generated solution in Visual Studio. * 2) Select the project generated for Windows 8.1. Select the References node, Right Click and select "Add Reference". * 3) Click "Browse", locate the EncryptedStorage plugin location on your disk * 4) Select the SAP.EncryptedStorage.winmd file for the appropriate CPU architecture of your project (x86 or x64). This file is located in {EncrypedStorage plugin location}/windows81/bin/[x86 or x64] * 5) Click OK to add the reference. **********************************************************
